animeTitle: Jikuu Ihoujin Kyoko: Chocola ni Omakase!
otherNames: ime Stranger Kyoko: Leave it to Chocola, Time Stranger Kyoko: Chocola ni Omakase!, 時空異邦人KYOKO ちょこらにおまかせ！
synopsis: Preparing a party for her anniversary with the King, when he failed to show up Chocola decided to run away from the castle.
